name: CyberQuest 2045 Part 1
description:
Hey Everyone ! Here is my first attempt at making a game ! This is a prototype of a game that I will continue doing chapter by chapter if the concept is fun enough! 

Don't hesitate to comment in order to report bugs or ideas for improvement !

Hope you will enjoy!

Thilmis

CONTROLS:

Keyboard Controls:                                                                       XBOX Gamepad Controls:

  • WASD -> Move ( you can double jump)                 Left Joystick -> Move
  • E-Interaction                                                                         X-> Interaction
  • I -> Melee Attack                                                                B-> Melee Attack
  • O-> Shoot                                                                                RT-> Shoot

                                                                                                                A-> Jump

                                                       ----------------------------------------
STORY:

14th March 2045, 6.37PM:

The night is falling on Central City. 

Rick Ashton is a detective in the Central Police Force. As he was about to leave work , he received a call from a mysterious man who wants to meet him in person to reveal something he couldn't say on the phone.

Start the investigation and find out what threat is hovering over Central city.
                       


CREDITS      :

All assets can be found on itch io and opengameart    !
